oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Crest of Orchard Knob, Missionary Ridge, Tenn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Color tinted photograph of the New Jersey Monument and others on the crest of Orchard Knob in Chattanooga. Features a white border, divided back, and handwritten notes on reverse. [No. 11366] Note: this is an additional copy of this postcard and is the same image as 49352.
oai_dc:dc.dc:coverage: Chickamauga & Chattanooga National Military Park (Ga. And Tenn.); Missionary Ridge (Tenn. and Ga.); Chattanooga (Tenn.); Hamilton County (Tenn.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: National parks & reserves; Monuments & memorials
